AddCasterComponent.summary: Adds a component to a production studio.

AddCasterEpisode.summary: Adds an episode to a production studio.

AddCasterEpisodeGroup.summary: Adds an episode list to a production studio for carousel playback.

AddCasterEpisodeGroupContent.summary: Adds an episode list to a production studio for carousel playback.

AddCasterLayout.summary: Adds a layout for a production studio.

AddCasterProgram.summary: Adds an episode list to a production studio.

AddCasterVideoResource.title: AddCasterVideoResource
AddCasterVideoResource.summary: Adds a video source to a production studio. The number of video sources is limited by the number of input channels of the production studio.

AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode
AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Adds a custom transcoding configuration for a streaming domain.

AddLiveAppRecordConfig.title: AddLiveAppRecordConfig
AddLiveAppRecordConfig.summary: Adds a recording configuration for an application or a live stream.

AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig
AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Configures snapshot settings for a streaming domain.

AddLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Configures callbacks for audio moderation results.

AddLiveCenterTransfer.title: AddLiveCenterTransfer
AddLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Adds a configuration of live center stream relay.

AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig.title: AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig
AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Configures callbacks for video moderation results. As a result, a callback URL that is used to receive the callback notifications is added.

AddLiveDomain.title: AddLiveDomain
AddLiveDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to ApsaraVideo Live. This operation allows you to add only one domain name at a time.

AddLiveDomainMapping.title: AddLiveDomainMapping
AddLiveDomainMapping.summary: Create the mapping between a streaming domain to an ingest domain.

AddLiveDomainPlayMapping.title: AddLiveDomainPlayMapping
AddLiveDomainPlayMapping.summary: Creates the mapping between a main streaming domain and a sub-streaming domain.

AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig.title: AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig
AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Creates a stream pulling configuration for a live stream.

AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig
AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Creates a recording callback configuration for a streaming domain.

AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig.title: AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig
AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig.summary: Adds a video moderation configuration for live streams in an application under a domain name.

AddLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddLiveStreamTranscode
AddLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Adds transcoding configurations for a streaming domain.

AddPlaylistItems.summary: Adds episodes to a production studio of the video carousel mode.

AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode
AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Creates a Real-Time Streaming (RTS) transcoding configuration for a streaming domain.

AddShowIntoShowList.title: AddShowIntoShowList
AddShowIntoShowList.summary: Adds an episode to an episode list.

AddStudioLayout.summary: Configures a layout for a virtual studio.

AddTrancodeSEI.title: AddTrancodeSEI
AddTrancodeSEI.summary: Inserts supplemental enhancement information (SEI) to a live stream when the live stream is transcoded.

AllowPushStream.summary: Restores stream ingest. You can call this operation to restore stream ingest for a room in which stream ingest is disabled.

BatchDeleteLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Deletes the configurations of multiple domain names at a time.

BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs
BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Configures multiple domain names at a time.

CancelMuteGroupUser.title: CancelMuteGroupUser
CancelMuteGroupUser.summary: Unmutes members in a message group.

CloseLiveShift.title: CloseLiveShift
CloseLiveShift.summary: Disables time shifting for a domain name, or disables time shifting for an application or a live stream under the domain name.

CopyCasterSceneConfig.summary: Copies the configuration of a PVW scene to a PGM scene.

CreateCustomTemplate.title: CreateCustomTemplate
CreateCustomTemplate.summary: Creates a custom stream mixing template.

CreateEventSub.title: CreateEventSub
CreateEventSub.summary: Creates a callback to subscribe to channel or user events.

CreateLiveRealTimeLogDelivery.summary: Configures real-time log delivery for a domain name.

CreateLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.summary: Creates an M3U8 index file for a specified time period.

CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress.title: CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress
CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress.summary: Creates a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) ingest URL for a channel.

DeleteCasterComponent.title: DeleteCasterComponent
DeleteCasterComponent.summary: Deletes a component from a production studio.

DeleteCasterEpisode.summary: Deletes an episode from a production studio.

DeleteCasterEpisodeGroup.summary: Deletes an episode list for carousel playback from a production studio.

DeleteCasterLayout.summary: Removes a layout of a production studio.

DeleteCasterProgram.summary: Deletes an episode list from a production studio.

DeleteCasterSceneConfig.summary: Clears the configurations of a scene.

DeleteCasterVideoResource.summary: Removes a video resource from a production studio.

DeleteCustomTemplate.title: DeleteCustomTemplate
DeleteCustomTemplate.summary: Deletes a custom stream mixing template.

DeleteEventSub.title: DeleteEventSub
DeleteEventSub.summary: Deletes a callback that is used to subscribe to channel or user events.

DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig.title: DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig
DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig.summary: Deletes the recording configurations of an application.

DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig
DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Deletes snapshot configurations for live streams in an application.

DeleteLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

DeleteLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results.

DeleteLiveDomain.title: DeleteLiveDomain
DeleteLiveDomain.summary: Removes a domain name from ApsaraVideo Live.

DeleteLiveDomainMapping.title: DeleteLiveDomainMapping
DeleteLiveDomainMapping.summary: Deletes the mapping between a streaming domain and an ingest domain.

DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping.title: DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping
DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping.summary: Deletes the mapping between a main streaming domain and a sub-streaming domain.

DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer.title: DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer
DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Deletes the configuration of edge node stream relay.

DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.title: DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig
DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Deletes a configuration that triggers stream pulling.

DeleteLiveRealTimeLogLogstore.summary: Deletes the Logstore that is specified by a configuration of real-time log delivery.

DeleteLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Deletes the configurations of real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the recording callback configuration of a streaming domain.

DeleteLiveRecordVodConfig.title: DeleteLiveRecordVodConfig
DeleteLiveRecordVodConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of the Live to VOD feature.

DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig.title: DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig
DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig.summary: Deletes domain name configurations in the canary release environment.

DeleteLiveStreamTranscode.title: DeleteLiveStreamTranscode
DeleteLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Deletes the transcoding configurations of a live stream.

DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Deletes the callback configuration for stream ingest under an ingest domain.

DeletePlaylistItems.summary: Removes episodes from an episode list.

DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth.title: DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth
DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth.summary: Deletes the authentication configuration for the callback for snapshots.

DeleteStudioLayout.summary: Removes a layout from a virtual studio.

DescribeAutoShowListTasks.title: DescribeAutoShowListTasks
DescribeAutoShowListTasks.summary: Queries the scheduled tasks that are used to start and stop playlists at the specified points in time.

DescribeCasterChannels.summary: Queries the channels of a production studio.

DescribeCasterComponents.summary: Queries the components of a streaming panel.

DescribeCasterConfig.title: DescribeCasterConfig
DescribeCasterConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of a production studio.

DescribeCasterLayouts.summary: Queries a specified layout or all layouts of a production studio.

DescribeCasterProgram.summary: Queries the information about an episode list in a production studio.

DescribeCasterSceneAudio.summary: Queries the audio configurations of a scene.

DescribeCasterScenes.summary: Queries information about the scenes of a production studio.

DescribeCasterStreamUrl.summary: Queries the streaming URLs of a production studio.

DescribeCasterVideoResources.title: DescribeCasterVideoResources
DescribeCasterVideoResources.summary: Queries the video resources of a production studio.

DescribeCasters.summary: Queries the list of production studios.

DescribeChannelParticipants.title: DescribeChannelParticipants
DescribeChannelParticipants.summary: Queries online users in a channel.

DescribeChannelUsers.title: DescribeChannelUsers
DescribeChannelUsers.summary: Queries the details of online users in a channel.

DescribeDomainUsageData.title: DescribeDomainUsageData
DescribeDomainUsageData.summary: Queries the resource usage data of specific domain names in a specified billable region.

DescribeForbidPushStreamRoomList.title: DescribeForbidPushStreamRoomList
DescribeForbidPushStreamRoomList.summary: Queries rooms for which stream ingest is disabled.

DescribeHlsLiveStreamRealTimeBpsData.title: DescribeHlsLiveStreamRealTimeBpsData
DescribeHlsLiveStreamRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries the information about HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) streams, such as the number of online users and bandwidth.

DescribeLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

DescribeLiveCenterTransfer.title: DescribeLiveCenterTransfer
DescribeLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Queries the information about a configuration of live center stream relay.

DescribeLiveCertificateDetail.title: DescribeLiveCertificateDetail
DescribeLiveCertificateDetail.summary: Queries the details of a certificate.

DescribeLiveCertificateList.title: DescribeLiveCertificateList
DescribeLiveCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates of a specified domain name or all the domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLiveDelayConfig.title: DescribeLiveDelayConfig
DescribeLiveDelayConfig.summary: Queries the information about a stream delay configuration.

DescribeLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results.

DescribeLiveDetectPornData.title: DescribeLiveDetectPornData
DescribeLiveDetectPornData.summary: Queries the usage data of content moderation.

DescribeLiveDomainBpsData.title: DescribeLiveDomainBpsData
DescribeLiveDomainBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more streaming domains.

DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer
DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries the bandwidth and traffic data by protocol for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo.title: DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo
DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo.summary: Queries certificate information about a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainConfigs.title: DescribeLiveDomainConfigs
DescribeLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Queries one or more configurations of a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainDetail.title: DescribeLiveDomainDetail
DescribeLiveDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic information about a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateDat.title: DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateData
DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateDat.summary: Queries the frame rates and bitrates of all the live streams under an ingest domain.

DescribeLiveDomainLimit.title: DescribeLiveDomainLimit
DescribeLiveDomainLimit.summary: Queries the limits on the numbers of ingested streams, transcoded streams, and relayed streams under a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainLog.title: DescribeLiveDomainLog
DescribeLiveDomainLog.summary: Queries the address from which you can download the raw access logs of a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainMapping.title: DescribeLiveDomainMapping
DescribeLiveDomainMapping.summary: Queries the information on how a domain name is mapped with another domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum.title: DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum
DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum.summary: Queries the number of online users of all live streams under a main streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData
DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more ingest domains.

DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data for one or more ingest domains.

DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData
DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData.summary: Queries the data of page views (PVs) and unique visitors (UVs) of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data that is collected every minute for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData
DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the proportions of HTTP status codes that are returned for a domain name. Data is collected every minute.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data that is collected in real time for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery
DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries the information about real-time log delivery for a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData
DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData.summary: Queries the numbers of live recording channels and container format conversions.

DescribeLiveDomainSnapshotData.summary: Queries the number of snapshots for one or more specified domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainStagingConfig.summary: Queries the configurations in the canary release environment.

DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData.title: DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData
DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData.summary: Queries the transcoding length for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData.title: DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData
DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData.summary: Queries the resource usage data of time shifting for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainTranscodeData.summary: Queries the statistics on the transcoding length for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer.title: DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer
DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Queries the configuration of edge node stream relay.

DescribeLiveLazyPullStreamConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of triggered stream pulling for a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveProducerUsageData.summary: Queries the production studio usage data.

DescribeLivePullStreamConfig.summary: Queries the stream pulling configurations for a domain name.

DescribeLivePushProxyLog.title: DescribeLivePushProxyLog
DescribeLivePushProxyLog.summary: Queries the address from which you can download the stream relay logs.

DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc.title: DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc
DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc.summary: Queries the number of real-time log deliveries.

DescribeLiveRecordConfig.title: DescribeLiveRecordConfig
DescribeLiveRecordConfig.summary: Queries the recording configurations of all applications under a streaming domain name.

DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig
DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the recording callback configurations of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveRecordVodConfigs.title: DescribeLiveRecordVodConfigs
DescribeLiveRecordVodConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of the Live to VOD feature.

DescribeLiveShiftConfigs.title: DescribeLiveShiftConfigs
DescribeLiveShiftConfigs.summary: Queries the time shifting configurations under a domain name.

DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig.title: DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig
DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig.summary: Queries the snapshot configurations of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData.title: DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData
DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData.summary: Queries the frame rates and bitrates of a live stream that is based on Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) in a specified time period.

DescribeLiveStreamCount.summary: Queries the number of online original streams and transcoded streams among live streams.

DescribeLiveStreamHistoryUserNum.summary: Queries the number of historical online users for a live stream.

DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData.title: DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData
DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of streams for a domain name. Up to 5,000 rows of data can be returned for each query.

DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList.title: DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList
DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList.summary: Queries the list of created monitoring sessions.

DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData.title: DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData
DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData.summary: Queries the stream ingest data of a specified domain name at the application level and the stream level.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordContent.title: DescribeLiveStreamRecordContent
DescribeLiveStreamRecordContent.summary: Queries the recordings of a live stream.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile.title: DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile
DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile.summary: Queries the information about an M3U8 index file.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.title: DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles
DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.summary: Queries the information about all M3U8 index files within a specific time period.

DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo.title: DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo
DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo.summary: Queries the snapshots that are captured within a specified period.

DescribeLiveStreamState.title: DescribeLiveStreamState
DescribeLiveStreamState.summary: Queries the status of a single live stream in real time.

DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo.title: DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo
DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo.summary: Queries the transcoding configurations of live streams under a main streaming domain.

DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList.title: DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList
DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList.summary: Queries the blacklist of live stream URLs under a main streaming domain.

DescribeLiveStreamsControlHistory.title: DescribeLiveStreamsControlHistory
DescribeLiveStreamsControlHistory.summary: Queries the operation history of live streams under a domain name or in an application.

DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Queries the callback configuration for stream ingest under an ingest domain.

DescribeLiveStreamsOnlineList.summary: Queries the information about all active streams for a specified domain name or the active streams of an application under a specified domain name.

DescribeLiveStreamsPublishList.title: DescribeLiveStreamsPublishList
DescribeLiveStreamsPublishList.summary: Queries the stream ingest records of a domain name or an application or stream under a domain name.

DescribeLiveTagResources.title: DescribeLiveTagResources
DescribeLiveTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of domain names.

DescribeLiveUserDomains.title: DescribeLiveUserDomains
DescribeLiveUserDomains.summary: Queries the domain names for CDN within your Alibaba Cloud account based on the specified conditions.

DescribeMeterLiveInteractionDau.summary: Queries the peak daily active users (DAU) of live streams within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost.title: DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost
DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost.summary: Queries the information about the factors that cause latency of first frames within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameDelay.summary: Queries the average latency of first frames within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayFailStatus.summary: Queries the causes of playback failures that occurred within a specified period of time. The causes are returned in the form of status codes.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayTime.title: DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayTime
DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayTime.summary: Queries the playback duration within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData.title: DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData
DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData.summary: Queries the total number of playbacks and the number of successful playbacks within a specified period of time.

DescribeRoomKickoutUserList.title: DescribeRoomKickoutUserList
DescribeRoomKickoutUserList.summary: Queries users that are removed from a room. The removal operation is performed on the client.

DescribeRoomStatus.summary: Queries the status of a live room, including the stream ingest state.

DescribeShowList.title: DescribeShowList
DescribeShowList.summary: Queries the details of an episode list.

DescribeStudioLayouts.title: DescribeStudioLayouts
DescribeStudioLayouts.summary: Queries one or more layouts of a virtual studio.

DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Suspends real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

EditPlaylist.title: EditPlaylist
EditPlaylist.summary: Updates episodes in an episode list.

EffectCasterUrgent.summary: Switches a program scene to a standby video in a production studio.

EffectCasterVideoResource.summary: Updates the standby video resource in a specified scene.

EnableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Enables real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

ForbidLiveStream.title: ForbidLiveStream
ForbidLiveStream.summary: Disables the ingest of a live stream.

ForbidPushStream.title: ForbidPushStream
ForbidPushStream.summary: Disables stream ingest. This operation allows you to control whether the streamer in a room can ingest streams.

GetAllCustomTemplates.title: GetAllCustomTemplates
GetAllCustomTemplates.summary: Queries all custom stream mixing templates.

GetCustomTemplate.title: GetCustomTemplate
GetCustomTemplate.summary: Queries information about a custom stream mixing template.

GetEditingJobInfo.title: GetEditingJobInfo
GetEditingJobInfo.summary: Queries the information about one or more editing tasks.

GetMessageApp.title: GetMessageApp
GetMessageApp.summary: Queries the information about a specified interactive messaging application.

GetMessageGroup.title: GetMessageGroup
GetMessageGroup.summary: Queries the information about a message group.

GetMessageToken.title: GetMessageToken
GetMessageToken.summary: Obtains a token that the client can use to establish a persistent connection over the LWP protocol and based on atomic capabilities.

InitializeAutoShowListTask.summary: Creates a scheduled task to start and stop the playback of a playlist at the specified points in time.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries all configurations of real-time log delivery under an Alibaba Cloud account.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains.summary: Queries all domain names that are associated with a specific configuration of real-time log delivery.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.title: ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos
ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.summary: Queries all configurations of real-time log delivery.

ListMessageGroup.summary: Queries the message groups of a specified user.

ListMessageGroupUser.title: ListMessageGroupUser
ListMessageGroupUser.summary: Queries the members of a message group.

ListMessageGroupUserById.title: ListMessageGroupUserById
ListMessageGroupUserById.summary: Queries user information by user ID.

ListPlaylist.summary: Queries the information about specified episode lists or all episode lists that belong to the current account.

ListPlaylistItems.summary: Queries the information about episodes in an episode list.

ModifyCasterComponent.summary: Modifies a component of a production studio.

ModifyCasterEpisode.summary: Modifies the configurations of an episode in a production studio.

ModifyCasterProgram.summary: Modifies an episode list of a production studio.

ModifyCasterVideoResource.title: ModifyCasterVideoResource
ModifyCasterVideoResource.summary: Modifies input sources of a production studio.

ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Modifies the configuration of real-time log delivery for a domain name.

ModifyShowList.summary: Modifies the attributes of an episode list.

ModifyStudioLayout.summary: Modifies a layout of a virtual studio.

MuteAllGroupUser.title: MuteAllGroupUser
MuteAllGroupUser.summary: Mutes a message group. In this case, all members of the message group are muted.

MuteGroupUser.summary: Mutes members in a message group.

OpenLiveShift.title: OpenLiveShift
OpenLiveShift.summary: Enables time shifting for a domain name, or enables time shifting for an application or a live stream under the domain name.

PublishLiveStagingConfigToProduction.summary: Publishes the configurations of an accelerated domain name from the canary release environment to the production environment.

QueryMessageApp.title: QueryMessageApp
QueryMessageApp.summary: Queries interactive messaging applications based on specified conditions.

QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth.title: QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth
QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth.summary: Queries the authentication configuration for the callback for snapshots.

RemoveShowFromShowList.summary: Removes a specified episode from an episode list.

ResumeLiveStream.summary: Resumes the ingest of a live stream.

RollbackLiveStagingConfig.summary: Rolls back the configurations of an accelerated domain name in the canary release environment.

SendLike.title: SendLike
SendLike.summary: Configures likes in a message group.

SendMessageToGroup.title: SendMessageToGroup
SendMessageToGroup.summary: Sends a message to all members in a message group.

SendMessageToGroupUsers.title: SendMessageToGroupUsers
SendMessageToGroupUsers.summary: Sends a message to specified users in a message group.

SendRoomNotification.title: SendRoomNotification
SendRoomNotification.summary: Configures a notification message in a room, such as a notification message that is sent when a user enters or leaves the room. This operation is suitable for configuring notification messages that are broadcasted to the entire room.

SendRoomUserNotification.summary: Sends a message to a user in a room, such as a message that notifies the user about a gift.

SetCasterChannel.summary: Configures a channel of a production studio.

SetCasterConfig.title: SetCasterConfig
SetCasterConfig.summary: Configures all parameters for a production studio. If a parameter is not specified, the production studio does not have the relevant configuration.

SetCasterSceneConfig.summary: Sets all parameters, and configures and applies a layout for a scene of a production studio.

SetLiveDomainCertificate.title: SetLiveDomainCertificate
SetLiveDomainCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate for a specified domain name. When you call this operation to enable the SSL certificate, you can also modify the certificate information.

SetLiveDomainStagingConfig.summary: Sets or modifies domain name configurations in the canary release environment.

SetLiveEdgeTransfer.title: SetLiveEdgeTransfer
SetLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Sets the configuration of edge node stream relay.

SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.title: SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig
SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Creates a configuration that triggers stream pulling.

SetLiveMpuTaskSei.title: SetLiveMpuTaskSei
SetLiveMpuTaskSei.summary: Configures the custom supplemental enhancement information (SEI) for co-streaming.

SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Configures stream ingest callbacks for an ingest domain.

SetSnapshotCallbackAuth.title: SetSnapshotCallbackAuth
SetSnapshotCallbackAuth.summary: Configures authentication for the callback for snapshots.

StartPlaylist.summary: Starts playback for an episode list.

StopPlaylist.summary: Stops playback for an episode list.

UpdateCasterSceneAudio.summary: Modifies the audio configurations of a scene.

UpdateCasterSceneConfig.summary: Modifies a scene, including the layout, without invalidating the previous configurations.

UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig
UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Modifies the snapshot configurations of a streaming domain.

UpdateLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

UpdateLiveCenterTransfer.title: UpdateLiveCenterTransfer
UpdateLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Modifies a configuration of live center stream relay.

UpdateLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results. As a result, the callback URL that is used to receive the callback notifications is changed.

UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig.title: UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig
UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Modifies the stream pulling configurations of a live stream.

UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig
UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the recording callback configurations of a streaming domain.

UpdateLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

UpdateLiveStreamMonitor.title: UpdateLiveStreamMonitor
UpdateLiveStreamMonitor.summary: Updates the configurations of a monitoring session.

UpdateMessageApp.summary: Updates the configurations of an interactive message application.

UpdateMessageGroup.title: UpdateMessageGroup
UpdateMessageGroup.summary: Updates the information about a message group.
